purpose: Provide a starter template for building fullstack applications with AI integration and modern web technologies
principle: Combines Hono framework with OpenAPI & RPC, Nuxt for frontend, and SST Ion for serverless infrastructure
reusability: Modular architecture with plug-and-play components, supports various integrations like Kinde Auth and Tanstack Query
limitations: Primarily targeted at developers familiar with the included technologies, requires customization for specific use cases
